content:
/>
XIV.4.D.3.a
.
Earned Income Payer Letters
The Hines Information Technology Center (ITC) sends letters directly to
payers
of earned income.
Payer letters request verification of income for the
tax year of the match, and
following two years.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
